Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2017/07/14 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'Deutsch'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Robert Pulcini'], 'Producers': ['Richard Gladstein'], 'Starring': ['Scarlett Johansson', 'Laura Linney', 'Alicia Keys'], 'Studio': ['Lions Gate Films', 'Inc.']} Review Text: This movie is exactly how life is behind the closed doors of rich families in NYC...
I was AuPair (foreign nanny) for over a year and this movie was like 90% of my life 10 year ago... I also had a boy and he was 7 y old...and we had a peanut butter from the jar (only no double dipping lol)
I also was fired because my "host mom" became jealous of kid's love towards me...He started to call me my mommy and the best friend. I tried to explain him the difference, BUT he said..mommy is who takes care of you and loves you, and you the only person who is....
I guess nothing else to add....Nanny cam and I was fired...
So many similarities in a movie...omg...
Anyway, the best part is I met my hubby. He also lived almost "next door"..and "my host mom" did not like our relationship, saying he is out of my class....
Now I am happily married for almost 8 years and became a doctor. Still live in NY next door to my EX-"host mom" -)))) Review Title: Exactly how life is behind closed doors of rich families in NYC Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Angelina Ballerina - The Lucky Penny Review Date: 2019/06/09 Store: Finty Williams (Actor), Judi Dench (Actor), Kitty Taylor (Director), Roger McIntosh (Director) & 1 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles Product Description: ['When Angelina finds a lucky penny, she decides she doesn\x92t need to practice for an important audition. But when she loses the penny, she realizes that practice makes perfect after all. With Angelina\x92s support, Alice enters a gymnastics championship and learns to persevere as she overcomes her fear of the balance beam. Angelina also lends a helping hand to her new friend, Anya, a harvest mouse who is down on her luck, and to her grandpa as she searches for his lost war medal. It\x92s a lucky day for everyone in Angelina Ballerina: The Lucky Penny!'] Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Kids & Family, Music Videos & Concerts', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Finty Williams, Lucy Raby, Kitty Taylor, Paul Larson, Katharine Holabird, Jo Wyatt, Judi Dench, Keith Wickham, Roger McIntoshFinty Williams, Lucy Raby, Kitty Taylor, Paul Larson, Katharine Holabird, Jo Wyatt, Judi Dench, Keith Wickham, Roger McIntosh See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.75 inches; 4.48 Ounces', 'Director': 'Kitty Taylor, Roger McIntosh', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '55 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 15, 2003', 'Actors': 'Finty Williams, Judi Dench, Keith Wickham, Jo Wyatt', 'Studio': 'Universal Studios Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Katharine Holabird, Lucy Raby, Paul Larson', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Very cute for 3 y old baby. Review Title: Adorable & sweet for my baby Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/08/22 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tony Croll', 'Claudia Frank', 'Bob Schermerhorn', 'Rebecca Taylor Henning', 'Allison Coleman', 'Kevin Mock', 'Guido Verweyen', "Bryan O'Donnell", 'J. Rupert Thompson', 'Amy Elkins'], 'Starring': ['Tyra Banks', 'J. Alexander', 'Kelly Cutrone'], 'Studio': ['The CW']} Review Text: I love the American Next Top Model. But this one was so stupid. It remained me of all thouse boring shows on Bravo, house wife of NY, Ca and so on...
Very staged with ugly cat fights Review Title: The worst season of All Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a consumer with a strong preference for informative content, particularly regarding food and health, as evident from high ratings for documentaries advocating local farming and healthy eating. This individual exhibits a positive sentiment towards well-crafted narratives that include relatable themes, highlighted through their enthusiastic responses to engaging films and documentaries. 

Common themes include a discernible interest in movies exploring human experiences and societal issues, as well as an affinity for family-oriented and animated content, especially for children. Quality seems to be a significant factor, with preferences leaning towards well-produced works featuring strong storytelling, though they demonstrate a low tolerance for poorly executed films or tedious narratives, often resulting in low ratings.

Despite a tendency to appreciate higher quality productions, there is an evident price sensitivity, as seen in the selection of mid-range priced items, particularly children's content. There’s an inclination for engaging stories that resonate personally, as reflected in user comments about life similarities with narrative elements.

Overall, these observations synthesize into core preferences for educational and thought-provoking content that is enjoyable yet grounded in real-life experiences, coupled with a keen interest in quality visual storytelling across a spectrum of genres.
